name: GJL Game Parade Fall 2021 - Left out (FinalUploadBeforePolish)
name_original: GJL Game Parade Fall 2021 - Left out (FinalUploadBeforePolish)
description:
Hello, I'm a solo developer that worked on this game, hope you enjoy it. For information on "how to play/what to do" check out the options in the main menu.I didn't have much time to balance out the game so I will try and do it on the polish submission date.Any and all advice/constructive criticism welcomed.

Almost all the assets here were made by me, with the exception of the sound effects and the Unreal enginge thirdperson character model.

Links so webpages, where I got my sound effects from:

https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/game-music-and-loops/

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/super-suspense/1539

https://www.dreamstime.com/stock-music-sound-effect/correct-answer.html
